actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Yard_Location SET
		Location = '{{update_location.fieldState.Location.isVisible ? update_location.formData.Location.replace(/ /g,'').toUpperCase().substr(0,4) + ' ' + update_location.formData.Location.replace(/ /g,'').toUpperCase().substr(4) : update_location.sourceData.Location}}',
		Date_Added = '{{update_location.fieldState.Date_Added.isVisible ? update_location.formData.Date_Added.split('T')[0] : update_location.sourceData.Date_Added}}',
		Notes = '{{update_location.fieldState.Notes.isVisible ? update_location.formData.Notes : update_location.sourceData.Notes}}'
WHERE Location = {{location_table.selectedRow.Location}};

UPDATE Invalid_Scaling SET
		Location = '{{update_location.formData.Location}}'
WHERE Location = {{location_table.selectedRow.Location}};
